meta.title: Ercan Cicek | Experienced Frontend Developer & UX Designer in Dusseldorf | Portfolio & Blog
meta.description: Welcome to the website of Ercan Cicek, a Frontend Developer and UX Designer based in Dusseldorf. Explore the portfolio showcasing innovative web applications, read insightful articles on my blog, and learn more about me and my work.

meta.title: Ercan Cicek's Portfolio | Web & App Projects
meta.description: Explore Ercan Cicek's portfolio showcasing a variety of web and mobile development projects. Discover the technologies used, project details, and more.

portfolio.box-image-alt: smartphone screen of the portfolio entry

description.part-after-label: project in Ercan Cicek's portfolio. Learn about the technologies used, challenges faced, and the solutions implemented.

meta.title: Ercan Cicek's Blog | Web Development, Design Principles, and More
meta.description: Explore Ercan Cicek's blog for insightful articles and resources on web development, design principles, and more.

meta.title: About Ercan Cicek | Experienced Frontend Developer & UX Designer in Dusseldorf
meta.description: Learn more about Ercan Cicek, an experienced Frontend Developer and UX Designer based in Dusseldorf with over nine years of experience in conceptualizing and implementing web applications. Specializing in Vue, React, Figma and building the bridge between design and development.

ec-description.part-before-skills-list: With over nine years of experience in frontend development and UI/UX design, I specialize in
ec-description.part-after-skills-list: as my preferred tools. My passion lies in creating intuitive and attractive interfaces that provide real added value to users. Continuously seeking out new trends and technologies, I strive to enhance user experience and project performance. My expertise in accessibility ensures that I help companies design websites in compliance with the
ec-description.part-after-ielts: C1 certificate and possessing multilingual communication skills, I effectively collaborate with international teams and stakeholders to implement their requirements and feedback.

ai-chatbot.first-message: I am a GPT trained to answer questions on behalf of Ercan. Feel free to ask me anything. For specific inquiries, please consider direct contact.
ai-chatbot.loading-answer: The AI is thinking. Please wait...

error.rate-limit-exceeded: So many people used this chatbot that we've reached the cost limit for now. Thank you for your interest and please try again later or contact me directly.
error.generic: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.

content-liability.headline: Content Liability
content-liability.desc: As a service provider, I am responsible for my own content on these pages under § 7 (1) of the German Telemedia Act (TMG). However, according to §§ 8 to 10 TMG, I am not obligated to monitor transmitted or stored third-party information or investigate circumstances indicating illegal activity. Obligations to remove or block the use of information under general laws remain unaffected.

links-liability.headline: Links Liability
links-liability.desc: My offer includes links to external websites of third parties over whose content I have no influence. Therefore, I cannot assume any liability for this external content. The respective provider or operator of the linked pages is always responsible for their content.

privacy.headline: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: I take the protection of your personal data very seriously. No personal data is collected or processed on this website. No cookies are used, and no user data is collected or analyzed.
privacy.embedded-data: The website may contain external content (such as embedded photos and videos) that could transmit data to third parties. You can control the use of such external services through your browser's settings.

contact.headline: Contact
contact.desc: If you have any questions about this privacy policy, feel free to contact me at:

cv-privacy.headline: CasualVocab Privacy Policy
cv-privacy.intro: Ercan Cicek built the CasualVocab Widget - Japanese app as a free service. This Privacy Policy explains the collection, use, and disclosure of personal information if you choose to use this app. By using this app, you agree to the terms described in this policy.

info-coll.headline: Information Collection and Use
info-coll.desc: The app does not directly collect personal information. However, third-party services like Firebase and AdMob may collect personal data for providing their services. I do not share or use your information except as described here.

third-party-services.headline: Third-Party Services
third-party-services.desc: This app uses the following third-party services:

firebase.desc: Firebase: Collects device information and app usage data for performance and functionality improvements. Reference:

admob.desc: AdMob: Uses cookies for serving personalized ads and improving services. Reference:

log-data.headline: Log Data
log-data.desc: In case of an error, I may collect log data that includes your device's IP address, device name, operating system version, app configuration, usage statistics, and the time and date of use. This data is collected by third-party services like Firebase.

cookies.headline: Cookies
cookies.desc: This app does not use cookies explicitly, but third-party services like Firebase and AdMob may use cookies for analytics, advertising, and improving services. You can choose to accept or refuse cookies through your device's settings, but refusing cookies may impact the functionality of the app.

security.headline: Security
security.desc: I value your trust in providing personal information. While I strive to use commercially acceptable means to protect your data, no method of transmission or storage is 100% secure.

other-sites.headline: Links to Other Sites
other-sites.desc: The app may contain links to external websites not operated by me. I am not responsible for the content or privacy policies of these third-party sites. Please review the privacy policy of each site you visit.

childrens-privacy.headline: Children's Privacy
childrens-privacy.desc: I may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Please review it periodically. Changes will be posted here, and the date of the last update will be shown. This policy is effective as of 2022-06-22.

contact.headline: Contact Me
contact.desc: If you have any questions or suggestions about this Privacy Policy, please contact me at:
